root: ^Camilla: Everytime you've dug into my head, it's helped. But every time after that? It's helped less. We're running out of time, doc.

WorryChoices: ^I'll buy you as much time as I can.
NotDoctor: ^Camilla: You're not? Weren't you who Joselito was seeing?
BuyTime: ^Camilla: Did you hear Joselito died? Just overnight. His boyfriend walked in and found him, lying in bed. He didn't even remember his boyfriend's name the night before. I'm not far from that.
Joselito: ^Camilla: He used to work at.. Well, I don't know. And now he's dead and gone. His whole life, my whole relationship with him, my whole life. Fading, fading away.
